summary.span: 表示可调整的箭头形状的线的末端。

span.span: Represents an adjustable arrow-shaped line cap.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 始终填充用此构造函数创建的箭头末端。

span.span: The arrow end caps created with this constructor are always filled.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 名为的对象 `myArrow` 。Creates an object named `myArrow`. - 创建一个 名为的对象 `capPen` ，并将其 和 属性设置为等于 `myArrow` 。Creates a object named `capPen`, and sets its and properties equal to `myArrow`. - 使用 方法在屏幕上绘制由两个箭头封闭的直线。Uses the method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例旨在与 Windows 窗体一起使用，并且它需要 `e` 一个 事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 此代码执行以下操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 名为的对象 `myArrow` 。Creates an object named `myArrow`. - 创建一个 名为的对象 `capPen` ，并将其 和 属性设置为等于 `myArrow` 。Creates a object named `capPen`, and sets its and properties equal to `myArrow`. - 使用 方法在屏幕上绘制由两个箭头封闭的直线。Uses the method to draw to screen a line capped by two arrows. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicMisc/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置箭头末端的高度。

span.span: Gets or sets the height of the arrow cap.
The height of the arrow cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭头帽的高度由 用于绘制封闭直线的对象的宽度进行缩放。The height of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the object used to draw the line being capped. 例如，如果您要使用宽度为5个像素的笔绘制带有边框的边框，并且该对象的 高度为3，则实际的箭头帽将绘制15个像素高。For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the object has a height of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels high.

summary.span: 获取或设置箭头末端的宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the width of the arrow cap.

value.span: 按单位计的箭头帽的宽度。

span.span: The width, in units, of the arrow cap.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 箭头帽的宽度按 用于绘制封闭线条的对象的宽度进行缩放。The width of the arrow cap is scaled by the width of the object used to draw the line being capped. 例如，如果您要使用宽度为5个像素的笔绘制带有边框的行，并且该对象的 宽度为3，则实际的箭头帽将绘制15个像素宽。For example, if you are drawing a capped line with a pen that has a width of 5 pixels, and the object has a width of 3, then the actual arrow cap is drawn 15 pixels wide.
